title: The Cyberspace Front in the Attacks on Ukraine
sub_head: A full Russian military assault on the country would likely involve debilitating digital strikes.
body:
Kyiv, Ukraine
As Russia threatens Ukraine, “cyber is issue No. 2”—second in importance only to the strength of the military and munitions, former Prime Minister Arseniy Yatsenyuk said in an interview last month. Our conversation was sandwiched between two major cyber attacks on Ukraine.
